general_advisory: Start sowing the summer crops when the temperature is conducive for germination.

advisory: Due to diurnal variation in temperature, there is a chance of Blast in Rice, to manage this apply Tricyclazole 0.6 g/liter of water.
Due to rise in temperature, provide irrigation 5 cm water up to 25 days of transplanting. It will help more number of tillers.
Due to rise in temperature, provide irrigation when thin hair-like cracks form in the field. Run cono weeder to control the weeds.
Due to weather survey, the infestation of YMV disease may be there, and to manage this apply Ridomil MZ @ 2g/liter of water.
Due to rise in temperature, provide irrigation at critical stages of Knee height stage.
To manage the Stem borer release T. Chilonis card @ 30,000/ac and repeat it after 10 days of the first release.
Provide irrigation due to the rise in temperature for easing Peg penetration and pod development.
After flowering, do not start inter cultivation work again, because from this time, the flower buds and its pods penetrate and set fruit.
Due to a diurnal variation in temperature, After 3-4 weeks of planting finger millet, apply 12 kg of molasses per acre.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem-based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
Due to the rise in temperature, survey for oxygen deficit may be there.
